CustomField.description: Calculates tax based on on the tax rates in the case. Needs to be divided by 100 otherwise it's very high.
CustomField.formula: IF( Case__r.Taxes_Additive__c, Total_of_all_Items__c * (Case__r.Tax_Rate__c + Case__r.Secondary_Tax_Rate__c), Total_of_all_Items__c * Case__r.Tax_Rate__c + (Total_of_all_Items__c + (Total_of_all_Items__c * Case__r.Tax_Rate__c)) * Case__r.Secondary_Tax_Rate__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tax calculation based on the rate(s) stored on the Case record
CustomField.label: Taxes
